comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: This Photo is so, so sad.   What happened and see how the Poor Babies are not even with diaper.    Could you please sent story in English ?   This is one of the saddest, Un-explained Photo's I have ever seen.  Could you supply info., on why they are outside this way ?   Hopefully I am too serious.        Poor Little Children.   Jesus says:    Suffer Not the Little Children.

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Oh My Goodness, I just read the story in English.   The Darned Germans invaded Norway and made many Children on Norwegian Women.   How terrible.   How would the Norwegain women let this happen ?  Then even some of the Norwegian Women married the German Nazi.      This is one of the Saddest stories, I have ever read.  Poor, Poor Little Children.
